title: A Race-Car Driver Keeps Selling His Favorite Turbo-Charged Station Wagon
sub_head: Robb Holland is buying his third Audi RS 6 Avant that, with almost 600 horsepower, can gobble up mountain roads and make very fast supermarket runs
body:
Robb Holland, a professional race-car driver in the SRO GT America championship series who lives in Denver, on his 2022 Audi RS 6 Avant, as told to A.J. Baime.
I have always been an Audi fan, and I have owned many during my lifetime. To me, the holy grail of Audis is the RS 6 Avant station wagon. The RS stands for Rennsport, which means “racing sport” in German. It’s the highest expression of performance that Audi makes. And the Avant is Audi’s word for station wagon.
